    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_93397</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93397</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Proper diet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korrekte Diät</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Régime approprié</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dieta apropriada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dieta adeguata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατάλληλη διατροφή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dieta apropiada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the disease called kwashiorkor can be cured within a month by proper diet and medicines.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kwashiorkor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">medicines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proper diet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Krankheit, die 
kwashiorkor genannt wird, innerhalb eines Monats durch korrekte Diät 
und Medizin kuriert werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la maladie appelée
le kwashiorkor peut être traitée dans un mois par régime et 
médecines appropriés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a doença chamada 
kwashiorkor pode ser curada dentro de um mês pela dieta e por 
medicinas apropriadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la malattia 
chiamata kwashiorkor può curarsi entro un mese dalla dieta e dalle 
medicine adeguate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ασθένεια 
αποκαλούμενη kwashiorkor μπορεί να θεραπευτεί μέσα σε έναν 
μήνα από την κατάλληλη διατροφή και τα φάρμακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la enfermedad 
llamada kwashiorkor se puede curar dentro de un mes por dieta y las 
medicinas apropiadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kwashiorkor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Medizin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">korrekte Diät</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
